text: Sigourney Weaver (born as Susan Alexandra Weaver on October 8, 1949, in New York) is an American actress. Sigourney Weaver played the role of Lieutenant Ellen Ripley in the movie series Alien, in the four movies Alien, Aliens, Alien³, and Alien: Resurrection. She is also well known for playing Dana Barrett in the movies Ghostbusters and Ghostbusters II or for the role Dian Fossey in the movie Gorillas in the Mist. She was the first person to win two Golden Globe acting awards in the same year. ==Filmography== Year Film Role Notes 1977 Annie Hall Alvy's Date Outside Theater 1978 Madman Not Specified 1979 Alien Ellen Ripley Nominated - BAFTA Award for Best Newcomer Nominated - Saturn Award for Best Actress 1981 Eyewitness Tony Sokolow Crew members & TV equipment From WNYW (then known as WNEW) appeared in the film.
